attributes.action: save the planet from environmental decline by passing a law that states all British citizens must travel only by pogo stick.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Sustainable transport is a very pertinent issue in our current climate. The decline of the environment is apparent and speedily increasing. In ensuring that all British citizens travel only by pogo stick we are aiding a halt in this dangerous decline.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
